ds2.2.2:6.2: Cattāro ca mahābhūtā, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya rūpaṃ—
ds2.2.2:6.4: Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ na hetu, ahetukaṃ, hetuvippayuttaṃ, sappaccayaṃ, saṅkhataṃ, rūpaṃ, lokiyaṃ, sāsavaṃ, saññojaniyaṃ, ganthaniyaṃ, oghaniyaṃ, yoganiyaṃ, nīvaraṇiyaṃ, parāmaṭṭhaṃ, upādāniyaṃ, saṃkilesikaṃ, abyākataṃ, anārammaṇaṃ, acetasikaṃ, cittavippayuttaṃ, nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ, asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ, na savitakkasavicāraṃ, na avitakkavicāramattaṃ, avitakkaavicāraṃ, na pītisahagataṃ, na sukhasahagataṃ, na upekkhāsahagataṃ, neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ, neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ, neva ācayagāmi na apacayagāmi, nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ, parittaṃ, kāmāvacaraṃ, na rūpāvacaraṃ, na arūpāvacaraṃ, pariyāpannaṃ, no apariyāpannaṃ, aniyataṃ, aniyyānikaṃ, uppannaṃ, chahi viññāṇehi viññeyyaṃ, aniccaṃ, jarābhibhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:10.1: Atthi rūpaṃ upādā, atthi rūpaṃ no upādā.
ds2.2.2:11.1: Atthi rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ anupādinnaṃ.
ds2.2.2:12.1: Atthi rūpaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ.
ds2.2.2:13.1: Atthi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ anidassanaṃ.
ds2.2.2:14.1: Atthi rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ appaṭighaṃ.
ds2.2.2:15.1: Atthi rūpaṃ indriyaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na indriyaṃ.
ds2.2.2:16.1: Atthi rūpaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na mahābhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:17.1: Atthi rūpaṃ viññatti, atthi rūpaṃ na viññatti.
ds2.2.2:18.1: Atthi rūpaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
ds2.2.2:19.1: Atthi rūpaṃ cittasahabhu, atthi rūpaṃ na cittasahabhu.
ds2.2.2:20.1: Atthi rūpaṃ cittānuparivatti, atthi rūpaṃ na cittānuparivatti.
ds2.2.2:21.1: Atthi rūpaṃ ajjhattikaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ.
ds2.2.2:22.1: Atthi rūpaṃ oḷārikaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:23.1: Atthi rūpaṃ dūre, atthi rūpaṃ santike. #14/14
ds2.2.2:25.1: Atthi rūpaṃ cakkhusamphassassa vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ cakkhusamphassassa na vatthu.
ds2.2.2:25.8: cakkhuviññāṇassa vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa na vatthu.
ds2.2.2:26.7: kāyasamphassassa vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ kāyasamphassassa na vatthu.
ds2.2.2:26.14: kāyaviññāṇassa vatthu, atthi rūpaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa na vatthu. #25/25

ds2.2.2:28.8: cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa nārammaṇaṃ.
ds2.2.2:29.7: kāyasamphassassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ kāyasamphassassa nārammaṇaṃ.
ds2.2.2:29.14: kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa nārammaṇaṃ. #25/25
ds2.2.2:31.1: Atthi rūpaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na cakkhāyatanaṃ.

ds2.2.2:40.1: Atthi rūpaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, atthi rūpaṃ na jīvitindriyaṃ. #8/8

ds2.2.2:49.1: Atthi rūpaṃ rūpassa upacayo, atthi rūpaṃ rūpassa na upacayo.

ds2.2.2:51.1: Atthi rūpaṃ rūpassa jaratā, atthi rūpaṃ rūpassa na jaratā.
ds2.2.2:52.1: Atthi rūpaṃ rūpassa aniccatā, atthi rūpaṃ rūpassa na aniccatā.
ds2.2.2:53.1: Atthi rūpaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro, atthi rūpaṃ na kabaḷīkāro āhāro. #12/12
ds2.2.2:57.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ajjhattikaṃ, taṃ upādā.
ds2.2.2:57.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ, taṃ atthi upādā, atthi no upādā.

ds2.2.2:58.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ, taṃ atthi upādinnaṃ, atthi anupādinnaṃ.

ds2.2.2:59.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ, taṃ atthi upādinnupādāniyaṃ, atthi anupādinnupādāniyaṃ.

ds2.2.2:62.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ, taṃ atthi indriyaṃ, atthi na indriyaṃ.

ds2.2.2:63.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ bāhiraṃ, taṃ atthi mahābhūtaṃ, atthi na mahābhūtaṃ.

ds2.2.2:111.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi mahābhūtaṃ, atthi na mahābhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:112.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:112.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:113.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:113.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:114.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi sanidassanaṃ, atthi anidassanaṃ.
ds2.2.2:114.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi sanidassanaṃ, atthi anidassanaṃ.
ds2.2.2:115.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi sappaṭighaṃ, atthi appaṭighaṃ.
ds2.2.2:115.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi sappaṭighaṃ, atthi appaṭighaṃ.
ds2.2.2:116.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi mahābhūtaṃ, atthi na mahābhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:116.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi mahābhūtaṃ, atthi na mahābhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:117.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:117.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:118.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:118.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ anupādinnupādāniyaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:119.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ, taṃ atthi indriyaṃ, atthi na indriyaṃ.
ds2.2.2:119.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ appaṭighaṃ, taṃ atthi indriyaṃ, atthi na indriyaṃ.
ds2.2.2:120.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ, taṃ atthi mahābhūtaṃ, atthi na mahābhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:120.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ appaṭighaṃ, taṃ atthi mahābhūtaṃ, atthi na mahābhūtaṃ.
ds2.2.2:121.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ indriyaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:121.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ na indriyaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:122.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ indriyaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:122.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ na indriyaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:123.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:123.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ na mahābhūtaṃ, taṃ atthi oḷārikaṃ, atthi sukhumaṃ.
ds2.2.2:124.1: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ mahābhūtaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike.
ds2.2.2:124.2: Yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ na mahābhūtaṃ, taṃ atthi dūre, atthi santike. #22/22
ds2.2.2:128.1: Pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu, vāyodhātu, yañca rūpaṃ upādā.
ds2.2.2:132.1: Cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, sotaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, ghānaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, jivhāviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, kāyaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, manoviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ.
ds2.2.2:136.1: Cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, sotaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, ghānaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, jivhāviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, kāyaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, manodhātuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, manoviññāṇadhātuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ.
ds2.2.2:140.1: Cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, sotaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, ghānaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, jivhāviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, kāyaviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, atthi sukhasamphassaṃ, atthi dukkhasamphassaṃ, manodhātuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ, manoviññāṇadhātuviññeyyaṃ rūpaṃ.
ds2.2.2:144.1: Cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ, kāyindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, yañca rūpaṃ na indriyaṃ.
ds2.2.2:148.1: Cakkhundriyaṃ, sotindriyaṃ, ghānindriyaṃ, jivhindriyaṃ kāyindriyaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, na indriyaṃ rūpaṃ atthi sappaṭighaṃ, atthi appaṭighaṃ.
ds2.2.2:152.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, yañca rūpaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ.
